page.title: 20Home Entertainment.
page.content: The most common form of home entertainment is watching television. This has been slightly altered in the last few years by two new ideas. The first of these is the growth of the home video market.Many people prefer to watch these to the broadcast programmes. The second factor is the growth of the home computer market.Many people (especially children)prefer to play one of a wide variety of games available. Of course there are still many traditional games played as well. This disc was written by the staff and children of the following schools; Holwell J.M.I.,Creswick J.M.I.,Holy Trinity Secondary School and Heronswood Secondary School.
